entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Showers beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 late this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 6 April 2023
